DOC.criteria: Pregnant ≥ 18 year age Singleton gestation Nulliparous Vertex presentation Gestational age ≥ 36 week Bishop score ≤ 6 undergoing induction labor Multiparous Preeclampsia admission Gestational chronic hypertension Nonvertex presentation Multiple gestation Chorioamnionitis admission Intrauterine growth restriction ( < 10th percentile ) BMI > 50 Presence uterine scar Participation research protocol involve induction labor Nonreassuring fetal heart rate trace admission
